description:
There`s something that Bunji wants so badly, so that`s how he started off doing part time work at home. Cleaning the toilet and bath, every time he does one task, he gets 50 yen. A happy Bunji got worked up, but...
Women`s Skills
Kanna and Yuki  both seem to be able to cook by themselves. Fumi was surprised by this and said that she wanted to make beef stroganoff. Mom has her hands full with work and gets Ai to do it, but...
Let`s Go To Kyoto!
hinking deep thoughts, Dad decides to go on a trip by himself. Dad enjoys sightseeing during the daytime and decides to splurge at night at an inn. But because he`s not a familiar customer, he gets refused and has trouble finding one...
Cats and Mom
Mom is home by herself, working at her own pace. Kiku the cat keeps on bugging her so Mom plays with her. Then Tora comes in. The cats keep playing around and having fun, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Part Time / Women`s Skills / Let`s Go To Kyoto! / Cats and Mom
アルバイト / 女みがき / 京都へいこう! / 猫とかあさん
